trans-unit.source: Represents an object that contains event arguments for the occurrence of a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException"></xref>.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class that contains information about an error that has occurred during the updating of a property value.
A message that indicates what failed during the property value change.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instance in which the exception is occurring.
The source that generated this exceptionâ€”a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> get or set operation.
The error that occurred during the property value change.
Gets the error that occurred during the property value change associated with this instance of event arguments.
Gets the message that indicates what failed during the property value change associated with this instance of event arguments.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> description of the error.
Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> associated with this instance of event arguments.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> associated with this instance of event arguments.
Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionSource"></xref> associated with this instance of event arguments.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionSource"></xref> associated with this instance of event arguments.
